import { memo } from 'react' import { Rating } from 'react-simple-star-rating' import { CommonDataForAllViewService } from '../ViewInformationDetailService' import Select from 'react-select'; import City from '../../Data/city.json' import { englishTypeOfCusine, vietnameseTypeOfCusine } from '../../Languages/TypeOfCusine'; import Switch from '@mui/material/Switch' function ViewInformationRestaurant({ languageSelected }) { const service = useContext(CommonDataForAllViewService) const typeOfCuisineList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishTypeOfCusine : vietnameseTypeOfCusine) return (
handleInputPropertyName(e.target.value)} value={service.propertyName} />
handleInputCity(e.target.value)}> {City.map((cityData) => ( ))}
handleInputAddress(e.target.value)} id='address' className="input-inline" type='text' />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='contactDateOfIssue' className="input-inline had-input" type='time' value={service.timeOpen} onChange={(e) => handleInputTimeOpen(e.target.value)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='contactPlaceOfIssue' className="input-inline had-input" type='time' value={service.timeClose} onChange={(e) => handleInputTimeClose(e.target.value)} />
handleInputWebsite(e.target.value)} disabled id='email' className="input-inline had-input" type='text' />
handleInputTaxCode(e.target.value)} disabled id='taxCode' className="input-inline had-input" type='text' />
